text: Hi Jon! Not at the moment I'm afraid but it's something that we have on the roadmap
Out of interest, what changes are you looking to make?
Is it the case that you're converting a "classic" RSS email into a drag and drop one?

If I remember correctly, we used to be able to clone the base drag-and-drop modules and then customize them. These base files seem to have disappeared from the Design Manager.... are they still available somewhere to clone from?
yeah since we have to delete the “classic” RSS email in order to use the drag and drop one, not sure how we can keep the data?
just pretty much looking to make the body container width bigger than the default 600px
